programme.desc: Pam & Jelly / Inside Angus - After Jelly goes missing, Parker and Lily volunteer to help Ms. Pam find her. // After accidentally swallowing an irreplaceable Shackleton family stamp, Parker goes inside Angus to retrieve it.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Night of the Living Bread - SwaySway and Buhdeuce invent a loaf of bread soirresistible, it turns their customers into bread-craving zombies.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep106
programme.desc: Parents Just Don't Understand - Evan is forced to return to his parents' house to secure Trolls Passage on the group's journey, but it won't be easy since he already burned that bridge.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Sour Power / Birthday Shmirthday: A Cleo Badette Documentary - When Ollie becomes obsessed with a sour candy challenge, he convinces monster Jeffrey to eat the candy for him. // Told in documentary style, Cleo films Ollie's preparations for Bernie's surprise birthday party.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep121
programme.desc: Man vs. Sewer / The Mutant Menace - The TMNT's lazy river ride through the sewers turns savage when Raph's accidentally separated and left alone. // The Turtles' failed attempts to do good deeds turn all of New York against them.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S01 Ep119
programme.desc: A Tail of Two Slithers - Craig meets his long-lost brother, Ronnie Slithers, who uses devious methods to try and turn the dudes against one another.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Dorg's Big Date / Dorg in the Ring - Mr. Drubb is sure to give Dorg a bad report at Parent-Teacher meetings, so RD disguises himself as Dorg's teacher. // When wrestler Vikyeti comes to town, the Magicals try to guarantee his defeat-but end up sending Dorg into the ring to face Vikyeti!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Brain Drain / Fanboyfriend - Following a particularly awesome crash landing, Fanboy's brain pops out of his head and he loses his memory. // Fanboy is practicing to be a superhero and "saves" damsel in distress, Lupe.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Frisky Business / Hot Dog - Peg goes out of town for a few days, leaving Dudley on his own for the first time in his whole life! // Dudley's takes part at the Petropolis Dog Show, but then Kitty gets in trouble with Chameleon - can Dudley manage both?!

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep525
programme.desc: Battle for the Infinite Ocean - The time has come to bring Tritannus and Icy down. An epic battle ensues with all of the planets' forces uniting as one. Bloom and the Winx must stop Tritannus before he activates the Emperor's throne. But will it be too late?

programme.title: Winx Club S05 Ep526
programme.desc: The End of Tritannus - Tritannus has his cousin, Aisha, in his clutches. She is a critical part of his plan for dimension domination. Could evil possibly prevail?

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Catlantic City / Scaredy Cat - Felicity brings Miguel to Catlantic City, where Miguel is locked up in the pound for being a dog. // Felicity, Miguel, Yana and Athena have to cross Phobia Forest to cash in coupons for free cupcakes.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep221
programme.desc: No Pictures, Please / Stuck on the Roof - Patrick leads an enthusiastic stranger on a tour of his favorite places in Bikini Bottom. // SpongeBob is afraid to get off the roof of the Krusty Krab, but he won't let that stop him from living his life!

programme.title: Razor
programme.desc: CGTN's brand new science and technology show, covering cutting edge developments from all over the world. RAZOR will show you the world's most powerful laser and the world's smallest anti-cancer treatment. It will take you from the weird world of quantum computing to the boundaries of the cosmos. RAZOR will show that we are already ""living in the future"!

programme.desc: Whose titles were on the line at UFC 275 as Glover Teixeira faced Jiri Prochazka and Valentina Shevchenko took on Taila Santos. Plus, Joanna Jedrzejczyk returned to face Zhang Weili in an epic rematch. See the main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep906EdwardsvsDiaz
programme.desc: Fan favorite Nate Diaz returned to action taking on surging welterweight contender Leon Rocky Edwards at UFC 263. See both athletes train and prepare ahead of their battle in front of a packed house in Glendale, Arizona.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep2

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep24
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.desc: All Elite Wrestling is a one-hour primetime show. The world's most popular wrestlers perform in one of the most anticipated shows, attracting a passionate fan base and creating a streamlined viewing experience that gives viewers the best seat in the house at home.

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC 294: Makhachev vs. Volkanovski 2
programme.desc: Prelims - On October 21, the UFC returns to Abu Dhabi, where two of the top fighters in the world, pound for pound, will meet again as Islam Makhachev defends his lightweight title against featherweight champion Alexander Volkanovski in the main event of UFC 294 at Etihad Arena. In February, the pair met for the first time, engaging in a Fight of the Year candidate that left fans demanding a rematch. Now Makhachev, who has won 12 straight, will attempt to make it two in a row over the Aussie star, who is hungry to even the score with the 155-pound king. Plus, middleweight sensation Khamzat Chimaev welcomes former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman to the division in a fight with serious title implications at 185 pounds

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Prelims - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
